          <title>
            <string language="en">Balloons</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ballone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ballons</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Balões</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Aerostati</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μπαλόνια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Globos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows balloons of different sizes. Gas expands to a larger volume when greater amount of heat is applied.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">balloon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cold</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">expansion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fridge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Volume</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">warm</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt Ballone der 
unterschiedlichen Größen. Gas erweitert zu einem größeren 
Datenträger, wenn grössere Menge Hitze angewendet wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre des ballons de 
différentes tailles. Le gaz augmente à un plus grand volume 
quand une plus grande quantité de la chaleur est appliquée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra balões de tamanhos 
diferentes. O gás expande a um volume maior quando uma 
quantidade mais grande de calor é aplicada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra gli aerostati dei 
formati differenti. Il gas si espande ad un più grande volume 
quando la quantità più grande di calore è applicata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει μπαλόνια των διαφορετικών
μεγεθών. Αέριο επεκτείνεται σε μια μεγαλύτερη ένταση 
του ήχου όταν εφαρμόζεται το μεγαλύτερο ποσό θερμότητας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra los globos de diversas 
tallas. El gas se amplía a un volumen más grande cuando la 
mayor cantidad de calor se aplica.</string>
          </description>
